name: Yandex Tracker
description: Integrates with Yandex Tracker for comprehensive issue management, queue operations, user management, and project...

capabilities: **User Management**: Retrieve user account information, including login details, email addresses, license status, and organizational data
**Multiple Transport Options**: Support for stdio, SSE (deprecated), and HTTP transports for flexible integration
**Issue Operations**: Retrieve detailed issue information, comments, related links, worklogs, and attachments
**Security Controls**: Configurable queue access restrictions and secure token handling
**Organization Support**: Compatible with both standard and cloud organization IDs
**Advanced Query Language**: Full Yandex Tracker Query Language support with complex filtering, sorting, and date functions
**Field Management**: Access global fields, queue-specific local fields, statuses, and issue types
**OAuth 2.0 Authentication**: Dynamic token-based authentication with automatic refresh support as an alternative to static API tokens
**Complete Queue Management**: List and access all available Yandex Tracker queues with pagination support and tag retrieval
**Performance Caching**: Optional Redis caching layer for improved response times
metadata.readme_excerpt: # Yandex Tracker MCP Server ![PyPI - Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/yandex-tracker-mcp) ![Test Workflow](https://github.com/aikts/yandex-tracker-mcp/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg?branch=main) ![Docker Workflow](https://github.com/aikts/yandex-tracker-mcp/actions/workflows/docker.yml/badge.svg?branch=main) ![Package Workflow](https://github.com/aikts/yandex-tracker-mcp/actions/workflows/package.yml/badge.svg?branch=main) [![smithery badge](https://smithery.ai/badge/@aikts/yandex-tracker-mcp)](https://smithery.ai/server/@aikts/yandex-tracker-mcp) mcp-name: io.github.aikts/yandex-tracker-mcp A comprehensive Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to interact with Yandex Tracker APIs. This server provides secure, authenticated access to Yandex Tracker issues, queues, comments, worklogs, and search functionality with optional Redis caching for improved performance.
